tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Shambulinga is a very nice and friendly doctor. He understands the problem and provides clarity on the treatment.
I was little scared for dental procedures due to past experiences but the doctor made me very comfortable, explaining every step and making sure I didn't feel anxious.
I got my fillings, cap replacement and teeth cleaning.All done with utmost care. The clinic is clean , hygienic and the pricing is also fair. Dr Veena mam is also very pleasant and welcoming.My overall experience is Great.I am so happy that I found this clinic and would highly recommend. ** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Initally visited this place for a general dental check up but with the help of such friendly doctor (special thanks to Dr shambulingan) we were given a clear picture of the issue and was provided with detail information step by step about the concern and proceeded each session with consent of the patient only. This place is definitely worth the time and money. Overall had a very satisfying experience with the results and I'm a happy patient with a good smile now. Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had my Mom's RCT done here and we were more than satisfied with the treatment without much pain. More than me, my Mom was scared but the way Dr. Shambhulinga explained the problem and made her comfortable was exceptional. I would definitely recommend him for all dental related problems, he will guide you completely and would advice what is good. 
Thank you so much doc for your support, courage and patience to make understand a patient the root cause of a problem in a polite and friendly way.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This was my first visit to a dentist in Bangalore and I purposely kept it discreet that I have a dentist family member. As expected, the dentist didnt even check with us if we needed the cleaning or filling or something else!
The problem was in right tooth and in his excitement he also cleaned the left tooth.
Now what did he clean on the left side???
It was a cavity filling done earlier. So if its a permanent cavity filling, why did he remove it?? Just to fill up again so that he could bill more!!!

The end of story is, we went with one problem of right side, now we are sitting with pain on both sides!!
Biggest problem with this doctor is - he doesn't listen *** **** ******* **** ** ****** ********
reply_text: Hello there was no filling hollow cavity inside & showed u before filling & ask to take xray u never did that u go on writing review every were prepare urself first to take the treatment. U think ur writing a negative review u will get satisfaction great .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
In totality he did a decent job. But honestly I found him to be too less patient and more commanding. He was little too impatient and wanted to talk about his own merits and experience versus calmly trying to understand my case. I would have appreciated if he communicated in a more calm manner to me,doctors need to soothe and relax the patient, ** **** ** **** **** * *** ** ******** ****** ***** ** *** *** ****** ********* ** * ******** upon that he was not at all gentle.. 
Plus he didn‚Äôt give me any post cleanup and filling guidance. He seemed least interested to help me, but more incline to lecture me. * ***** ** ** ******* ******** ********** **** **** *** ******** **** ***** * * ******** 
I would rate 3/5.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

His consultation fees showed as 300 on the app. But on visiting he charged 500 as consultation fee and 1500 for * ****** teeth scaling procedure. So I ended up paying a total of 2000 rupees
